Editor navigation

Back to index

The editor navigation provides central controls for the editor.

  1. The new button initialises a new image in the editor, deleting all existing layers.
  2. The save as button allows for the image currently in the editor to be downloaded. Clicking the button prompts the user for a file name, and then the image is downloaded with the given file name in the browser.
  3. Manual links to the user manual.
  4. Walkthroughs links to the editor walkthroughs.
